description: Another reason why a _DOCX file may be created by an email program, such as Windows Live Mail, is if the filename ends with a "." before the "." in the extension. For example, the email program changes sample..docx to sample._docx . This also commonly occurs with .DOC , .XLS , and .XLSX files.

Users may create DOCX files with various word processors, including Microsoft Word, Apache OpenOffice Writer, or Apple Pages. The files may store different types of documents, such as letters, reports, resumes, invitations, newsletters, business proposals.
